website_summaries.verdict: This jam free stapler works as smoothly as any electric stapler on the market. It's a no-frills workhorse that gets the job done every time.
pros: The one-touch button for reloading staples makes continuous stapling an easy prospect
Allowing for either outlet power, or the use of 4 AA batteries, the YoRiBo Electric stapler can go anywhere and do any job you have
cons: Some argue that it doesn't seem quite as durable and solidly constructed as other options

customer_reviews.title: Works good
customer_reviews.text: Exactly what I was looking for, a stapler they can run on batteries or electricity and one that wasn't super expensive and break the bank. Is stapler checked off all those boxes and it works very good. I haven't tried to staple say like 10 pages together. But it is done a great job and seamlessly stapled two and three pages together. It comes with a few Staples but my wife had to go to the store and buy more. Very easy to load new Staples in it with a simple push of a button. I'm really glad that I found this stapler on Amazon and gave it a shot. If you're reading my review, I definitely recommend this stapler.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin

customer_reviews.title: It does the job. But....
customer_reviews.text: It contained approximately 10 staples. They could have at least included a box of staples since it is a special size and does NOT use the standard staples.
customer_reviews.author: mimimarian

customer_reviews.title: Heavy duty?
customer_reviews.text: I bought this stapler because I needed something heavy duty for my office. While this stapler works and is quiet, I would not say it's heavy duty at all. This unit should be used for light duty work. I staple documents all day long, some of which can be very thick. I couldn't even get some of the papers in the slot. I finally gave it to someone in an office across the hall who's job doesn't require the stapling needs I have. Then I went online and bought a much more heavy duty unit that could handle the needs of my office.
customer_reviews.author: Gigi

customer_reviews.title: Using in the classroom
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my classroom. They sharpen pencils (#2 size) perfectly, including colored pencils. I like that they are light weight and do not take up much space. My complaints... (1) The shavings collection cup does not disconnect from the device so you have to bring trash can over to the sharpener and dump the whole think by tipping it over into the trash can or unplug and carry it over to the trash can; and (2) The power cord is very short , not reaching floor plug from table top or barely reaching wall plug and that's if it is placed directly near outlet, thus limiting options of where to place the sharpener.
customer_reviews.author: Kimberly D. Cabral

customer_reviews.title: Holds pages hostage when it runs out of batteries, only staples ~20 times per set of 4 batteries!
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: The plug no longer stays in the stapler, so I need to use batteries. It goes through 4 batters in ~20 staples. When it runs out, it runs out while the pages are held in place by the staple. It won't let go of my paper until I put in new batteries. If I'm out of batteries, I have to go buy them or order then and wait for them to be delivered to get my paper back!! Old review: I'd prefer that the staple were placed closer to the edges of the page, but it won't spit out a staple until the paper is pushed in all the way.
customer_reviews.author: Capri

customer_reviews.title: Worth it
customer_reviews.text: Very Fast, Quiet, and Efficient, Love this Stapler! This stapler is amazingly powerful and super fast at the response time when putting in paper to staple; it seems almost instantaneous! I tried it with a couple sheets first then with a load of 15 sheets that were thick, and it handled them no problem at all; I was actually surprised that it would handle that thick of a stack of sheets with no issues at all; super easily!
customer_reviews.author: Cfrancis

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working in 2 months
customer_reviews.text: Electric Stapler stopped working in 2 months. Poor quality. Return window expired yesterday otherwise would have returned it. Now I have to throw in the trash and never to buy such a poor quality product again.
customer_reviews.author: Kanwal Nayyar

customer_reviews.title: Best electric stapler I have purchased
customer_reviews.text: This is the 3rd electric stapler I have purchased in the last few years. It is by far the best. Although I must say I only use it for 2 or 3 sheets.
customer_reviews.author: D. S. Motor

customer_reviews.title: Dam Good Price than anybody else
customer_reviews.text: What the vendor stated, that the Stapler can do was Right On I have no more problem stapling papers together.
customer_reviews.author: James L.

customer_reviews.title: Nice size stapler
customer_reviews.text: Nice that stapler uses batteries, so cord is not required. It’s a small size so it doesn’t take up much room which is nice. Only wish that it held more staples.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It staples!
customer_reviews.text: The picture makes it seem like it would be bigger. It staples, but the place to insert the pages is really tricky to access quickly. Loading it seems easy. I hope jams and such are easy to fix, but I have only been using a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Todd Brooks

customer_reviews.title: so good!!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: definitely not lightweight but it works so if i were you i would buy it
customer_reviews.author: SRS1998

customer_reviews.title: Great stapler!
customer_reviews.text: It's perfect if you do a lot of stapling because my wrist would always hurt from picking up the stapler. I love it! And would highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: glow girl

customer_reviews.title: Cool
customer_reviews.text: A little loud when stapling but does the job well
customer_reviews.author: Jodi Schick

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good, so far
customer_reviews.text: Too soon for me to know for sure. But so far so good. I wish I could fit more paper more easily into the opening.
customer_reviews.author: Angela P

customer_reviews.title: Decent
customer_reviews.text: Be careful w/ drawer that holds staples, don't push or pull it too hard.
customer_reviews.author: G P.

customer_reviews.title: Reliable stapler
customer_reviews.text: It’s fast and does the job. As a teacher, I have to do a lot of stapling. This saves my hands.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Ortega

customer_reviews.title: STOPPED WORKING AFTER TWO MONTHS
customer_reviews.text: OPERATIONAL BUT WILL NO LONGER 'STAPLE' DOCS AT ALL. PIECE OF YOU KNOW WHAT. VERY UNSATISFIED WITH QUALITY. NOW ITS TOO LATE TO SEND IT BACK!!
customer_reviews.author: MsStryker

customer_reviews.title: Switch does not work
customer_reviews.text: When feeding papers into staple slot, the switch activating the stapler doesn't work most of the time - yes, it is plugged in. WASTE OF MONEY
customer_reviews.author: Marv Weiss

customer_reviews.title: Too Loud.
customer_reviews.text: It's way too loud for a quiet office setting. Returned for refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Choose something else
customer_reviews.text: Cheap, poorly packed. Better off using glue to keep paper together
customer_reviews.author: Jacob

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY TERRIBLE PRODUCT !!!!
customer_reviews.text: This product was terrible!!! The AC/DC Adapter DID NOT FIT INTO THE STAPLER. Therefore, worthless to me!!!
customer_reviews.author: JoAnn Loveland

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: We ordered 2 for our office. Should have returned because they only will staple 2 pieces of paper. Stapler opening is way too small.
customer_reviews.author: Tyra Hoggle

customer_reviews.title: Not happy
customer_reviews.text: Does not feel comfortable in your hand. Paper has to slide in a certain way or it won’t work.
customer_reviews.author: Julia D MacEachin

customer_reviews.title: 3rd Amazon failure
customer_reviews.text: After ordering this, it worked for 2 weeks then it just stopped stapling. Another failure of Amazon products. This is my third failed Amazon product. You’re a failure Amazon. You’re a failure! What happened to your quality of product and service. You’re a dismal failure!
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: as i expected, i am very satisfied with the shipping especially the products i really like, highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Sandon miller

product_meta.title: YoRiBo Electric Stapler, Heavy Duty Electric Stapler, Battery or AC Powered, Jam-Free Up to 25 Sheets of Papers, Professional for Office School Home Use
feature_bullets: 👍Save your time - Improve your work efficiency with the electric stapler, quickly and easily staple up to 25 sheets papers. You can use it with AC power cable and also can use it with 4 AA batteries(battery not include).
👍Automatic working - The electric stapler can automatic work due to it has a built-in sensor, just put papers into the opening and gently hit it inside, then finish work.
👍Easy to reloading staples - One-touch button to reloading staple, there has a button at the back of the stapler, just push it and easy to reloading staple, suitable for 26/6 or 24/6 staples.

👍Staple file effortless - Are you still use traditional manual stapler? Do you feel wrist pain after use manual stapler for a long time? Try our electric stapler now, will help you avoid hand and wrist pain, easy and effortless to tidy your files.

💝👍100% RISK-FREE PURCHASE: The compact and pragmatic stapler has CE qualification, suitable for kids' birthday, staff welfare, anniversary celebration or business gift, The stapler comes with a 3 year extended warranty.Need a replacement or refund? Contact us at ：afonase-us@outlook.com
